name: extension
description: Note: The names of the javascript files are important.

scripts.build: browserify ./src/content.js -o ./dist/content.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && browserify ./src/background.js -o ./dist/background.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.watch: watchify src/content.js -d -o ./dist/content.js -v [ babelify --presets [es2015] ] && watchify src/background.js -d -o ./dist/background.js -v [ babelify --presets [es2015] ]
